trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a method of either an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> object is called that is incompatible with the current state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> 物件的方法與物件的目前狀態不相容時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, this exception is thrown if the **CancelAsync** method of either object is called when the object is not performing an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果擲回這個例外狀況**CancelAsync**物件未執行非同步的寫入作業時，呼叫其中一個物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定錯誤條件之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需要的資料。

trans-unit.source: The context, which includes source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 已序列化資料流的內容，包括來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> class that provides specific <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。
這個建構函式受到保護。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定錯誤條件且包含例外狀況原因之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
